28 
29 import rospy
30 import numpy as np
31 import urllib
32 import random
33 import cv2
34 from cv_bridge import CvBridge, CvBridgeError
35 from sensor_msgs.msg import Image
36 
37 roboturl = None
38 
39 def url_to_image(url):
40  resp = urllib.urlopen(url)
41  image = np.asarray(bytearray(resp.read()), dtype="uint8")
42  image = cv2.imdecode(image, cv2.IMREAD_COLOR)
43 
44  return image
45 
46 def start():
47  global roboturl
48 
49  rospy.init_node('nachi_tp_view', anonymous=True)
50 
51  roboturl = rospy.get_param("/nachi_tp_view/roboturl")
52  fps = rospy.get_param("/nachi_tp_view/fps", 1)
53 
54  tpscreen = rospy.Publisher('/nachi_tp_view/screen', Image, queue_size=100)
55  rate = rospy.Rate(fps)
56 
57  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
58  # I want to publish the Canny Edge Image and the original Image
59  msg_frame = CvBridge().cv2_to_imgmsg(url_to_image("http://{0}:16734/snapshot?q={1}".format(roboturl, str(random.randint(111111111,999999999)))), encoding="bgr8")
60  tpscreen.publish(msg_frame)
61  rate.sleep()
62 
63 if __name__ == "__main__":
64  start()
65
